name: lightrail-api-v2-docs
description: If you are looking for the official Lightrail documentation please go to https://lightrailapi.docs.apiary.io/#. This repository is for internal Lightrail use and is responsible for generating the API Blueprint file that is hosted by Apiary.

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run lint && redoc-cli bundle openapi3.yaml --options.menuToggle --options.expandResponses="200,201" --options.sortPropsAlphabetically --options.requiredPropsFirst --options.theme.colors.primary.main="#006CFF" --options.theme.sidebar.backgroundColor="#f2f5f7" && mkdir dist && mv redoc-static.html dist/index.html
